name: Progress Bar Color
description: This mod lets you customize your progress bar color!You can set your normal/practice progress bar manually or follow your player colors.

normal-follow.name: Normal Bar Follow Player
normal-follow.description:
Make Normal Progress Bar color follow current player color.
0->Default:Set it manually
1->Follow Main Color
2->Follow Secondary Color
3->Follow Glow Color

normal-manual.name: Normal Bar
normal-manual.description:
Color of Normal Progress Bar color
Only works when Normal Bar Follow Player is set to zero

practice-follow.name: Practice Bar Follow Player
practice-follow.description:
Make Practice Progress Bar color follow current player color.
0->Default:Set it manually
1->Follow Main Color
2->Follow Secondary Color
3->Follow Glow Color

practice-manual.name: Practice Bar
practice-manual.description:
Color of Practice Progress Bar color
Only works when Practice Bar Follow Player is set to zero

level-info-layer.name: Level Entrance
level-info-layer.description: Apply to LevelInfoLayer where you enter a level

pause-layer.name: Pause Menu
pause-layer.description: Apply to PauseLayer (pause menu), already fits BetterPause mod

official-level.name: Official Levels
official-level.description:
Apply to Robtop's official levels select menu.
The hardest part for modding, but I guess few old players even care this.
